text: Maybelle "May" Parker-Jameson (n√©e Reilly), commonly known as Aunt May, is a fictional in the Marvel Comics universe and a Spider-Man character. She raises Peter Parker. She was married to Ben Parker until he was shot and killed. Aunt May does not know that Peter Parker is Spider-Man. Aunt May later married John Jonah Jameson, Sr. (the father of J. Jonah Jameson). == In other media == The character has appeared in different forms of media including television series, movies, and video games as well. She was played by Rosemary Harris in Spider-Man (2002), Spider-Man 2 (2004), and in Spider-Man 3 (2007). She was then played by Sally Field in The Amazing Spider-Man (2012), and The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014). She is played by Marisa Tomei in the Marvel Cinematic Universe movies Captain America: Civil War (2016), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019), and in Spider-Man: No Way Home (2021). ==Other websites== * The Women of Marvel Comic's Aunt May Page * Aunt May's Profile at Spiderfan.org Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1962 Category:Marvel Comics supporting characters Category:Spider-Man
title: Aunt May
